computer_vision_streamliner.title: Computer Vision Streamliner
computer_vision_streamliner.description: A website designed to streamline the image label process for computer vision models. Allows users to upload, label, and download YOLOv8 friendly coordinates for up to 5000 images.

internship_emailer_script.title: Internship Emailer Script
internship_emailer_script.description: A script that fetches and parses a README before emailing me a list of computer science internship opportunities. I set up a cron job to continually check for new opportunities.

poker_game_engine.title: Poker Game Engine
poker_game_engine.description: A full scale no-limit Texas Hold'em poker engine in Java. Designed with Spring Boot, but never actually got around to finishing/deploying. I plan to pick it back up in the future!

uhelp.title: UHelp (HackUMass XII)
uhelp.description: A fine-tuned LLM providing specific mental health resources at UMass from user queries. I focused on web design and image-to-text functionality.

blackjack_cardcounter.title: Blackjack Card Counter
blackjack_cardcounter.description: A YOLOv8 computer vision trained to detect playing cards. Updates live count with associated card count (+1/0/-1), informing the user when they have a statistical advantage.

build_website.title: BUILD UMass Website
build_website.description: Website developer for UMass's pro bono software club. Personally did a lot of codebase refactoring by removing obsolete code, standardizing dependencies, and improving UI.

personal_portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
personal_portfolio.description: An updated version of my personal website. Originally, I had a dynamic display of my cooking videos on YouTube, but I got tired of Heroku Dynos fees.
